actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance in the year 1983 of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the world famous Staten Island Ferry.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a postage stamp to honor the Staten Island Ferry. Provides that such stamp shall be issued in the denomination used for first-class mail up to one ounce in weight and shall be placed on sale during the month of October, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance in the year 1983 of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the world famous Staten Island Ferry.
